newsitem.title: USA: Viewlogic sees Q3 revs of about $34 mln.
newsitem.headline: Viewlogic sees Q3 revs of about $34 mln.

text.p: Viewlogic Systems Inc said Wednesday that it expects third quarter revenues of $34 million.
The company said that earnings per share for the quarter would be $0.14-$0.18, which includes a $1.2 million pre-tax, or $0.04 per share, gain in investment income.
The lower than expected third quarter revenue level is primarily attributable to a shortfall in sales in Europe and, delays in the impact of recently released new products, the company said.
Viewlogic Systems, a supplier of electronic design automation software, will announce definitive third quarter results for 1996 on October 22.
